quest.name: Not Safe for Children
journal: Sentei needs help catching a predator.
objectives: Place the iron leg traps in the designated locations.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: You there, traveler! If you have the time, I would appreciate your help.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I was rooting around the other day and came across these iron leg traps.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I would love to make use of them and go hunting, but I know it would only aggravate an old injury of mine. Would you mind setting them up on my behalf?

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I have marked the locations where I want them placed on this map. Make sure you do not accidentally trap your own leg when you are setting them!

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: You will find the locations I want the traps placed on that map. Make sure you do not accidentally catch your own leg when you are setting them!

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: I take it you are finished? My thanks.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: In the old days I used to be quite handy with an axe. I could hunt all kinds of wild beasts without relying on silly traps. I even did my part in resisting the Empire when they invaded.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: However, a shot to my leg put an end to that. Every now and then the pain will flare up, and I am paralyzed until it abates. Do not worry, I will check the traps once I am able.

dialogue.name: SENTEI
dialogue.text: Here, take this for helping me.
